Package com.hoddmimes.distributor

Interface DistributorSubscriberIf

public interface DistributorSubscriberIf
Interface wrapping an subscriber object. Having an subscriber instance an application will be allowed to setup subscription for information that the application have an interest in. By default the subscriber does not receive any updates. The application must invoke the method addSubscription in order to register an interest. When setting up a subscription the application specifies a subject/topic the application has an interest in. The distributor will perform the filtering and just deliver updates that match the subjects/topics the subscriber has an interest in. The subject string is a hierarchical name string where levels are divided by the character "/ " for example "/foo/bar/fie ". The characters (strings) "* " and "... " works as wildcards. These strings must not be present in a subject when publishing data but are applicable when setting up an subscription. The "* " match any string at a certain level, for example "/foo/* /fie " will match any string at the second level. The string "... " matches all strings at the current level and all sublevels, for example "/foo/... " will match "/foo/bar/fie " and "/foo/allan/gazonk/47111 " etc.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Object addSubscription​(java.lang.String pSubjectName, java.lang.Object pCallbackParameter)
    Add an subscription.
    void close()
    Close and removes the subscriber.
    long getId()
    Returns the unique subscriber identifier.
    void removeSubscription​(java.lang.Object pHandle)
    Removes an active subscription

  • Method Details

    • addSubscription

      java.lang.Object addSubscription​(java.lang.String pSubjectName, java.lang.Object pCallbackParameter) throws DistributorException
      Add an subscription. Any update to any subject/topic matching specified subject name will unsolicited be passed to the DistributorUpdateCallbackIf being specified when the subscriber was created.
      Parameters:
      pSubjectName - subject / topic string, may contain wildcards.
      pCallbackParameter - callback parameter being passed to the, DistributorUpdateCallbackIf when information being updated.
      Returns:
      Object handle identifying the subscription request
      Throws:
      DistributorException

    • removeSubscription

      void removeSubscription​(java.lang.Object pHandle) throws DistributorException
      Removes an active subscription
      Parameters:
      pHandle - handle identifying the subscription. Passing "null" as argument will remove all active subscriptions.
      Throws:
      DistributorException

    • close

      void close()
      Close and removes the subscriber. All active subscriptions are implicitly removed.

    • getId

      long getId()
      Returns the unique subscriber identifier.
      Returns:
      long subscriber identifier
